message.content: {"nodes":[{"id":"startProcess","name":"Start Process","elementType":"startEvent","description":"User registers in the bank's system, providing basic information and creating an account.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"enterPersonalInformation","description":"Proceed to step 2"}],"properties":null},{"id":"enterPersonalInformation","name":"Enter Personal Information","elementType":"userTask","description":"System prompts the user to enter personal information, such as name, address, contact details, and identification documents.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"uploadDocuments","description":"Proceed to step 3"}],"properties":null},{"id":"uploadDocuments","name":"Upload Documents","elementType":"userTask","description":"User uploads identification documents (e.g., passport, driver's license), which are processed by an automated document verification system for authenticity and validity.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"riskAssessment","description":"Proceed to step 4"}],"properties":null},{"id":"riskAssessment","name":"Risk Assessment","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"System assesses the user's risk profile based on the provided information, analyzing factors like financial history, occupation, and purpose of the account.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"eddRequest","description":"Proceed to step 5"}],"properties":null},{"id":"eddRequest","name":"EDD Request","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"If the risk assessment triggers a need for EDD, system requests additional information and documentation from the user to fulfill regulatory requirements.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"sanctionsScreening","description":"Proceed to step 6"}],"properties":null},{"id":"sanctionsScreening","name":"Sanctions Screening","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"User's information is checked against international watchlists and sanction databases to ensure compliance with anti-money laundering (AML) regulations.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"pepScreening","description":"Proceed to step 7"}],"properties":null},{"id":"pepScreening","name":"PEP Screening","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"User's status as a politically exposed person is checked against relevant databases to identify potential risks.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"negativeNewsScreening","description":"Proceed to step 8"}],"properties":null},{"id":"negativeNewsScreening","name":"Negative News Screening","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"User's name is screened against news sources and public records for any negative associations or adverse media coverage.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"dataAnalysis","description":"Proceed to step 9"}],"properties":null},{"id":"dataAnalysis","name":"Data Analysis","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"System analyzes the collected data, screening results, and risk assessments to determine whether it has enough information to make a decision.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"decision","description":"Proceed to step 10"},{"targetNode":"enterPersonalInformation","description":"Branch back to step 2 if additional data is required"}],"properties":null},{"id":"decision","name":"Decision","elementType":"exclusiveGateway","description":"System decides whether the application is accepted or rejected based on all information collected to date","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"notifyApproval","description":"Proceed to step 11 if approved"},{"targetNode":"notifyRejection","description":"End process if rejected"}],"properties":null},{"id":"notifyApproval","name":"Notify Approval","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"System notifies the user of the successful application","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"accountActivation","description":"Proceed to step 12"}],"properties":null},{"id":"notifyRejection","name":"Notify Rejection","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"System notifies the user of the rejection reasons","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"endProcess","description":"End the process"}],"properties":null},{"id":"accountActivation","name":"Account Activation","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"Upon approval, the system triggers the account activation process, generating account details and necessary documentation.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"finalNotification","description":"Proceed to step 13"}],"properties":null},{"id":"finalNotification","name":"Final Notification","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"System notifies the user of successful account activation, providing account details, terms and conditions, and other relevant information.","connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"endProcess","description":"End the process"}],"properties":null},{"id":"endProcess","name":"End Process","elementType":"endEvent","description":null,"connectedTo":null,"properties":null}]}
